attributes.action: relinquish the basic right for the general public to petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petitions are a crude democratic tool which have no place in our global society of today. We who have signed below have relinquished our basic democratic right and pledged undying alleigance to whomever is prime minister, never to be questioned. We serve, therefore we are.

This petition against petitions is not a paradox.
